Definition: EHDS refined base model for A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare.
Classification of media as image, video, audio recording or other media type
The name of the imaging view e.g. Lateral or Antero-posterior
Who/What this Media is a record of
The date and time(s) at which the media was collected.
Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.
Observed body part, i.e. target site
The name of the device / manufacturer of the device that was used to make the recording.
The device used to collect the media.
The actual content of the media - inline or by direct reference to the media source file.
Comments made about the media by the performer, subject or other participants.
Performer of the imaging acquisition process.
